name: LD39 - Battery Leak!
description:
my LD39 Entry:

help little SanBot to reach the batteries scattered around in the levels to prevent him from shutting down. Manage SanBots power consumption by altering his maximum speed and jump height.

This game is somewhat rushed, due to the gamejams time limitation and i would happily work on it to make more levels, puzzles and implement eastereggs, aswell as make better graphics. Please leave me feedback in the comments!
